 Inference adding restricted existential quantifier to both sides of an equivalence.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2016.)
statement:
rexbii.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ps ) $.
rexbii $p |- ( E. x e. A ph <-> E. x e. A ps ) $.
